  <h2>Merge mods like never before!</h2>

TKMM is a mod manager and merger for Tears of the Kingdom developed by the [TKMM Team](./about). It handles mod merging, layering, RSTB calculation, and more.

To show support for the project, leave a star on the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/TKMM-Team/Tkmm).
